import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Button, Container } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { fetchCart } from "../redux/action/cart"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { SlideData } from "../data/data"; import Hero from "./Hero"; import Featured from "./Featured"; import img from "../assets/imgs/hero2.jpg"; import oil from "../assets/imgs/oil-home.jpg"; import shampoo1 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo1.jpg"; import shampoo2 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo2.jpg"; import shampoo3 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo3.jpg"; const Home = ({ products, fetchCart }) => { useEffect(() => { fetchCart(); }, []); let items = products?.results; let shampoo = items ?.filter((item) => item.category === "Shampoo") .substring(0, 1); console.log(shampoo); const showQuickView = () => { document.querySelector(".product-modal").classList.add("transparentBcg"); document.querySelector(".product-modal__wrapper").classList.add("show"); }; document.title = "Home | Luxury Silk Online"; return ( <>
